subject: Gaming UGC for real life players
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,


I’m Ashley - Army vet, Twitch streamer, and chaotic-good gaming content
creator. I make content for the *non-traditional gamer*: parents,
multitaskers, and full-time professionals who still make time to play.


I’ve partnered with brands like Sablute, Foxvox, and Huanuo to highlight
gaming gear through skits, reviews, and green screen setups that show how
gaming fits into a real, busy life. One of my favorite videos pulled in
49K+ views and sold over 25 keyboards - here
<https://www.tiktok.com/@ashley_at_work2/video/7386416969693547807?_r=1&_t=ZT-8vXTg0AW9xS>
it is if you want to check it out.


My style blends humor, storytelling, and authentic commentary. I focus on
connecting with gamers who aren't living in a fantasy bubble - they’re
juggling real responsibilities and still leveling up when they can.


I’d love to help Simsonn reach that audience with content that entertains
*and* converts. Want me to send over a concept idea?


Best,

Ashley

Portfolio <https://ashleythurstonugc.my.canva.site/ashleythurstonugc>
